languages.text: "Разговор с Вольным Торговцем положено начинать с поклона, ксенос. Я жду".

traits.locale_text: "Разговор с Вольным Торговцем положено начинать с поклона, ксенос. Я жду".

languages.text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."
languages.original_text: "Разговор с Вольным Торговцем положено начинать с поклона, ксенос. Я жду".

traits.locale_text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."
"Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."
"Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."
"Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."

languages.text: “根据习俗，对行商浪人开口之前要先鞠躬，异形。我还在等着呢。”
languages.original_text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."

traits.locale_text: “根据习俗，对行商浪人开口之前要先鞠躬，异形。我还在等着呢。”

languages.text: «Antes de empezar una conversación con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, xenos, es tradición hacer una reverencia. Estoy esperando».
languages.original_text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de empezar una conversación con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, xenos, es tradición hacer una reverencia. Estoy esperando».

languages.text: 「異種族よ、自由開拓者と話す前は一礼するのが決まりだ。そうするまでは一言も交わさない」
languages.original_text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族よ、自由開拓者と話す前は一礼するのが決まりだ。そうするまでは一言も交わさない」

languages.text: "Bevor man ein Gespräch mit einem Freihändler beginnt, Xenos, verneigt man sich üblicherweise. Ich warte."
languages.original_text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor man ein Gespräch mit einem Freihändler beginnt, Xenos, verneigt man sich üblicherweise. Ich warte."

languages.text: « Avant d'entamer une conversation avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, xénos, la coutume veut que l'on fasse une révérence. J'attends. »
languages.original_text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."

traits.locale_text: « Avant d'entamer une conversation avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, xénos, la coutume veut que l'on fasse une révérence. J'attends. »

languages.text: "Zeno, geleneklere göre bir Hür Tacir'le konuşmaya başlamadan önce önünde eğilmen gerekir. Bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Before beginning a conversation with a Rogue Trader, xenos, it is customary to bow. I am waiting."

traits.locale_text: "Zeno, geleneklere göre bir Hür Tacir'le konuşmaya başlamadan önce önünde eğilmen gerekir. Bekliyorum."
